cab.content:
This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.
G.T.6086
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 24th OCTOBER 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
South of VALENCIENNES the line runs :- east of ORS, east of BOIS L'EVEQUE, east of FONTAINE-AU-BOIS, east of ROBERSART, through ENGLEFONTAINE, east of GHISSIGNIES, east of RUESNES, road-junction 1\\2 mile north of RUESNES, thence went to VENDEGIES, (believed inclusive), thence north to QUERENAING (exclusive), MAING (inclusive).
French Front.
There is nothing to report.
2.ITALIAN AND PALESTINE FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
3.BALKAN FRONT.
After stubborn fighting the Serbians compelled the enemy to retreat from RAZANJ, capturing 300 prisoners.
General Staff
War Office, S.W.1.
24th October, 1918.
Issued at 18.45.
